Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne
ShortDescription: SB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses temp. rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Grand.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
